html.p: The Cyber Security Monitoring App is a custom Splunk application designed for security detection development and threat analysis. It provides a focused workspace for security analysts and detection engineers to build, test, and validate security use cases based on real-world attack techniques.
This application serves as a detection engineering platform that:

ol.li: Enables rapid development and testing of security detections without deploying to production
Provides visibility into attack patterns using curated datasets from the Splunk Attack Data repository
Maps security detections to the MITRE ATTACK framework for comprehensive coverage tracking
Offers a lightweight alternative to enterprise security platforms for use case development

html.p: Note: This app is not intended to replace comprehensive tools like Splunk Enterprise Security (ES), but rather complements them by providing a dedicated environment for detection content development.
